comments:
When selecting a bug from the Mylar task list an error dialog is displayed, and the following message is added to the log.

I am running Eclipse 3.2.2 on Debian Etch.

-- Error Log --
Date: Thu May 24 14:18:39 CEST 2007
Message: Could not create Browser page: No more handles [NS_InitEmbedding /usr/lib/iceweasel error -2147221164]
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.mylar
Stack Trace:

Sorry, my mistake, this is a FAQ:

http://www.eclipse.org/swt/faq.php#browserlinux

http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/Mylar_User_Guide#Memory_consumption_problem_with_internal_browser_on_Linux-GTK

Just to let other Debian Etch users know that in order to resolve this problem
I installed the "iceape" package and set MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME=/usr/lib/iceape.
Using /usr/lib/iceweasel did NOT work for me.
